snippet: As the June 30 deadline for the agreement approaches, Hassan Rouhani and other Iranian leaders say talks should continue longer if necessary.
abstract: Iranian Pres Hassan Rouhani states that he expects sanctions to be lifted within 'couple of months' following nuclear agreement; pace of sanctions relief has remained sticking point as negotiations enter final weeks.
lead_paragraph: As the June 30 deadline for the agreement approaches, Hassan Rouhani and other Iranian leaders say talks should continue longer if necessary.

headline.main: Iranian President Expects Sanctions to Lift Within Months of Deal
headline.print_headline: Iranian President Expects Sanctions to Lift Within Months of Deal
